name: Ley Line Disorder: Compensatory Onslaught
description:
End Phase: Deal 10 Physical DMG to all opposing characters.
When your characters take DMG: For each point of DMG your characters receive, the next time this card deals DMG, decrease the DMG dealt by 1.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 10 $[K100] to all opposing characters.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your characters take DMG:</color> For each point of DMG your characters receive, the next time this card deals DMG, decrease the DMG dealt by 1.
